name: Text And Drive: Friendship Never Dies
name_original: Text And Drive: Friendship Never Dies
description:
The sensation of a nation, now on itch.io (because my hosting kept exploding under the weight)!

WANT MORE? Check out my development tumblr or my twitter!
DJ audio and beta testing supplied by the inestimable James Rossi.
With all thanks to MC Mazzocchi for providing feedback.

Additional thanks to Google SketchUp for providing the models for multple in-game objects, as well as freesound for ambient noise and metal sounds.
All classical music sourced from musopen.

For the love of god, please don't actually text and drive.
